Ismail Abdul Hameed

He was born on the 21st of Maarch, 2002 at New Atuabo, a suburb within the Tarkwa-Nsuaem Municipality. His father is Alhaji Hamid and Daavi.

Career

He started his footballing career with Barcelona Babies in 2006 as one of the club's first ever players.

Due to his defensive capablities, his coach at the time, Spovis Haruna Yakubu, nicknamed him .

He had his basic education at Golden Age School Complex, where he featured in school matches before continuing his studies in St. John's Boys Secondary School.

He plays mostly as defender and occasionally as a goalkeeper for theIslamic Golden Eleven.

He enjoys playing FC25 Games at his leisure time.
